text:
@realDonaldTrump We also had the biggest amount o people dying. And this is what you’re tweeting about. You are the enemy that’s visible in plain sight. 
The only thing you should worry about is the #coronavirus. This tweet shows you only care about money & your re-election campaign. STFU!
